website_summaries.verdict: Definitely worth considering if you want a cat treat that doubles as an oral-health booster. Most cats enjoy eating them, too.
pros: Tasty tuna-flavored treats with shape and texture that helps clean teeth and freshen breath – has the Veterinary Oral Health Council Seal of Acceptance for tartar reduction
cons: Some reports of upset stomach, and some cats don't like them
The container's lid doesn't fit very well, which causes treats to lose freshness

customer_reviews.title: That the streets are helping my cat live longer and have stronger teeth and be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat absolutely loves the tuner grannies! She only gets them three times a day and when her alarm clock goes off in her head she comes in jumps up on the bed and starts her nightly or afternoon Ritual of crying for treats. She eats them one by one takes her time, she’s old almost 16, but can’t seem to get through her day unless she’s had her three daily treat times!
customer_reviews.author: Silvija Hellbusch

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves These Treats!
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a significant improvement in my cat's breath and he loves the taste. As soon as I pop the lid he rushes in to make sure he isn't missing out. I have been using these as training treats. He has now mastered sitting for a treat in response to a hand signal. The pop top packaging is easy and has kept the treats fresh so far. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by vet, enjoyed by cat
customer_reviews.text: I recently took my cat to the vet for a routine physical exam. Everything looked perfect, except for some mild tartar on her teeth. The vet wasn't too concerned about it, and recommended I try Greenies to help scrape some of the tartar off. My cat is obsessed with Temptations treats and extremely picky about any other kind, so with these it was very important to me that she actually eat them. And sure enough, she loves these! Hopefully the next time I take her to the vet she'll finally get that perfect bill of health, but in the meantime we're switching to Greenies for her daily treat.
customer_reviews.author: AFTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love Greenies
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these treats and Amazon has the best prices! I enjoy having them delivered to my door and saving a trip to the pet store for treats - I dare not run out of treats. I play a game with my cats using the treats every day before I leave for work. It's been a tradition for years and my cats make sure I don't forget. Their teeth are in great shape and we have a little fun. Also a good method to get the cats inside from the enclosed lanai when they are reluctant to come in.😉
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: My cats LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: Update: My cats now bend over backwards for this treat. I've used it as a reward system. Was able to successfully get my cats to learn sit, stay, speak, down, and up using these treats as a bribing point. Not to forget, they willingly go into their cages knowing they'll be rewarded with some of these treats. I've never had a treat that had this much of an effect on my stubborn cats. I share some of it with the local strays, they're also hooked. It is now used as a treat and they now beg for it. I have 3 cats and give each a minimum of 5 a day. Which they are very okay with
customer_reviews.author: Liah05Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Literally the only treats my cats like.
customer_reviews.text: As I cut myself off saying in my video, my older cat is six years old. I’ve bought him virtually every flavor and brand of treats and ended up feeding them all to my happy dog, because the cat hated them. These Greenies - I shake the box and my cats come RUNNING from across the house. We’ve tried Tuna, Catnip and Chicken and they’re all a winner. Catnip was a favorite but I also have cats who love catnip so your mileage may vary. Regardless, if my persnickety cat who hates everything loves these treats, then they’re a winner for me.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: my cat can't get enough of these
customer_reviews.text: I had bought these greenies for my cat previously at petsmart a much smaller quantity originally though. she was in love with them!! I then went to petsmart to get the bigger size this size and did a price comparison and amazon had them way cheaper and i have prime so got them in two days. she can't get enough of them!! she will coming running up when she knows its treat time and will stick her paw up to try and grab your hand to get them. she will also start meowing after she has had her 2 because she wants more.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Stinky plastic container.
customer_reviews.text: My seven cats are crazy for Greenies so the savings of buying this size was a benefit. However, the odor of the plastic used in the packaging smells poisonous. Maybe its just me but I am no longer buying this product because of it.. It can't be healthy for my cats to be eating a product stored in this type of plastic. I buy the 5.5 oz bags on subscribe and save and the cost is comparable.
customer_reviews.author: D. WELDON

customer_reviews.title: Best treats per my kitty!
customer_reviews.text: They need to ask our pets opinion. Ok, my hubby has tried one of two pets treats & thinks they are an ok snack. But my kitty things these are Purrrrrrrfect. My vet also says ok to give these in moderation. The crunchy treats are better for cats teeth since they can help pop off any plague that is building up. I get all the flavors so I can rotate them for kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Sue B.

customer_reviews.title: My kitty loves these and the container.
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I need to get my kitty to do something I shake this container or treats and he is putty in my hands. With that being said, he really likes them, but I have no idea why he is so crazy for them. Highly recommended size as it lasts forever, even if you are overly generous with how you administer them to your kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greenies are expensive
customer_reviews.text: My cat and dog are both obsessed with greenies and eat them every day. My cat actually wont eat any treats other than the tuna flavor of greenies, its unfortunate that they are so expensive because I can't afford to purchase them as often as he'd like.
customer_reviews.author: Flower219

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I started buying these dental treats because my cat is 12 years old and it’s a real struggle for me to brush his teeth. These Greenies seem to be very effective keeping his teeth clean plus he LOVES them!!! I’ll definitely keep buying them to avoid costly dental procedures for Woody.
customer_reviews.author: Furball

customer_reviews.title: ... them at a time she will throw up not good so I have to look for hypoallergenic snacks they're ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat really loves these treats she cries and tries to trip me over for them every single day they are not as crunchy as you think they are she almost swallows them whole but she has a hypersensitivity to what it's made out of and if I give her more than four of them at a time she will throw up not good so I have to look for hypoallergenic snacks they're good if your cat doesn't have a sensitive tummy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: product is great, plastic tub has terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: i love greenies, or rather my cats love greenies- BUT- i will be going back to ordering greenies in the bag rather than the tub. its a shame because the tub is much cheaper, but the smell is terrible. seriously. it has a distinctly plastic odor. i aired out the greenies and that seems to have helped and i've moved them to a different container, but after this- going right back to the bag.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Cat comes running when the box is shaked
customer_reviews.text: We have a ferrel cat that took us in at our last home. He lives in the garage and comes in and out as he pleases through the doggy door. When we moved recently we were afraid of him being out at night because of the coyotes around the neighborhood but its hard keeping a ferrel indoors. So in the evening if he sneaks out we shake the box of treats and he comes running so we can close the doggy door and keep him safe for the night.
customer_reviews.author: MBS

customer_reviews.title: Item damaged, opened, and non replaceable???
customer_reviews.text: I received this item cracked open on the lid and down the side. There was also no plastic seal around the top. Item as listed as non returnable and non replaceable? Why would anyone feed these to their pet opened and damaged?? What a waste of my money...
customer_reviews.author: April Knower

customer_reviews.title: Addicting for the kitties
customer_reviews.text: All three of my cats love these so they go quickly. They do not interfere with my cats eating their regular meals. However, the cats really look forward to treat times. Keep in mind you need to give your cats a bunch of these per day to have good dental affects. See instructions for how many to give daily.
customer_reviews.author: SonomaRN

customer_reviews.title: including all the best catfood, both dry and raw
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES his greenies. I do wonder sometimes just how "pure" they are, and whether some kind of natural flavor is "added" to make cats addicted to this. He will eat these till the cows come home..and likes them more than almost anything else I give him, including all the best catfood, both dry and raw, grain free, etc..that he also gets daily. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Mai Lee

customer_reviews.title: Kitty likes Greenies
customer_reviews.text: Our cat - "Pretty Face" - is sort of a picky eater. I wouldn't dare try to brush her teeth. She is 12 years old and likes the Greenies that we give her as treats, so it is easy to help her keep her teeth clean.
customer_reviews.author: B. J. P.

customer_reviews.title: Great cat treats. Your cat may go on strike wihout them...
customer_reviews.text: I have created a monster. My cat loves FELINE GREENIES Dental Treats for Cats. All day, even after regular feeding, it's "Where are my Greenies? More Greenies!!!". So I had to start buying the large tubs of Greenies, which are not only a better deal ounce per ounce cost wise but much more convenient to dispense. Cat loves them. I am a happy cat care giver and giver out of Greenies. RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: APC Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Freshens breath but may be hard on sensitive tummies.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old cat has a really sensitive stomach. He eats special food, but sometimes his breath is, while not unpleasant, strong. These treats remedy that, but unfortunately when he eats these we gave to deal with the smells that come out of the other end. Do they make breath freshener treats for finicky tummies? That would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ashes

customer_reviews.title: Picky cats like it!
customer_reviews.text: I have such picky cats and they won't eat half the treats they sell at the supermarket. They love these. We got the jumbo pack and it is great. It is a plastic container with a little flap at the top to get the treats out. It is very easy to open (easier than the bags) and I can even refill it. My cats are all 5 years + and they have pretty clean teeth. Not perfect but better than they could be and I do think it is because of greenies. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H

customer_reviews.title: Our cats really love greenies, which isn't too much of a surprise
customer_reviews.text: Our cats really love greenies, which isn't too much of a surprise, as the dogs love the dog version. The youngest cat will chase us across the house if we are carrying a container of greenies. It's pretty cute and silly. We haven't been using them long enough to assess impact on their teeth. I will say that, if you get a smaller soft sided package, do not leave it sitting out. The cats chewed through the first package and someone ate too many and then got a very upset stomach. Not pretty!
customer_reviews.author: LA in NJ

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these
customer_reviews.text: These are by far my cat's favorite treats; I think it's the satisfying crunch that they have. All I have to do is throw a treat and Quincy barrels on after it at full speed. Hard to tell if my cat's breath has gotten better; it seems better but that could just be the placebo effect.
customer_reviews.author: whoaitsjoe

customer_reviews.title: Your cat will not "paws" to eat these!!
customer_reviews.text: Fast service, and according to my cat Daisy, great taste!! I've already reordered! I was getting concerned with her treats she liked- calories and fillers, etc. I wanted something nutritious and with vitamins. I saw these in the store, but they're a bit pricey. But the price here is great and they come right to the door! And, as a bonus, she gets a box to play in!
customer_reviews.author: Cissy Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: Keeps teeth clean
customer_reviews.text: These actually work. From one vet visit to another her teeth stayed clean. Vet said she did not need a cleaning the last time and this was the only thing that changed. I give her five or six every night and they are always gone. I can not believe they wanted me to brush her teeth?
customer_reviews.author: CarlS0525

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: Greenies are recommended by the vet for my cat's dental health, but not more than 9 per day to avoid weight gain. Up to 3 times a day I throw 3 greenies across the floor and my cat hunts for them. It's a good way to get him moving and he hunts until he finds all 3.
customer_reviews.author: Abar

customer_reviews.title: Vomit inducing treats needed? You might not need to look any further
customer_reviews.text: Never realized until looking at other people’s feedback – – these definitely make at least one of my cats vomit without fail. I feel bad about this, but I just use them for stray cats outside now, thinking they would be grateful for the dental care in favor of a little vomit from living on the wild side
customer_reviews.author: Hagrumph

customer_reviews.title: They don't smell the greatest but it lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: My cats are obsessed with these. They don't smell the greatest but it lasts a long time. I don't think it's doing the greatest job of keeping their teeth fresh but it is a nice treat.
customer_reviews.author: novasenshi

customer_reviews.title: Mouse or Greenies? Greenies please!!!!
customer_reviews.text: All I have to do is ask my cat Finnigan do you want some :"Greenies" and I have his full attention each and every time, I like to think they help his dental health we will see what the vet says at the next check up. Finnigan says," two paws up get your feline friends some of these", he likes tuna and chicken.
customer_reviews.author: hollyberry

customer_reviews.title: Treats are too large for housecats!
customer_reviews.text: I like the bulk packaging, but my cats hate the size of the treats. They've had and loved all of the Greenies I've bought in foil pouches, but when this tub came, the pieces are as big as Cheerios, and both cats spit out the treats. I'm going to see of some of my friends' cats will eat them, otherwise, these are a waste. Unfortunately, I just got a text message that a tub of a second flavor was just delivered to my house. Maybe these will be smaller.
customer_reviews.author: D. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: FELINE GREENIES Dental Treats for Cats Tempting Tuna Flavor 12 oz.
customer_reviews.text: These Feline Greenies Dental treats for Cats are tempting and delicious. They crunch loudly when chewed making a nice feel in the mouth, at least that's what the cats say. 2 out of 3 cats like them. They aren't Green, but a dark brown and smaller than they used to be. I like them well enough.
customer_reviews.author: CDP's Onceagain habit of purchasingTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: I normally buy those bags and felt box would be easy to open and close
customer_reviews.text: my cat loves the treat. The box is very thin and not tightly closed, which is not I expected. I normally buy those bags and felt box would be easy to open and close. But the not-tightly-closed lid won't be good for the treats. They may get wet and bugs may get in.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: my cat loves greenies
customer_reviews.text: my vet recommends....we have been using for years and vat has no dental problems...cat loves this product
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Cats appear to love taste. Teeth have to be in good shape for chewing.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing about it to dislike, as long as cat young enough to have good chewing teeth. Would probably eat whole container if I let him. My older cat doesn't have adequate teeth for chewing.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Gilbertson

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them, package is convenient but will pop open if your cat knocks off counter.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these. I like the packaging for convenience (better than the ziplock type seal) BUT if your cat REALLY wants some treats and knocks these off the counter the package might pop open. My cat scored big one night by knocking these off the counter on purpose so now I know to keep them in the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Mckenna

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: I just fling kibbles across the room and the young cats chase after them and crunch them with great enthusiasm. Older one is above galloping around the house in pursuit of the treats but will not pass when offered either.
customer_reviews.author: Katya A

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats who like to lay by your face at night.
customer_reviews.text: My cat that I just adopted has bad breath and he loves to lay next to me on the other pillow in bed with me. He loves this and I couldn't be happier. I am out of this and will have to reorder soon. Keep up the great work, GREENIES!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: I like them better than my friends
customer_reviews.text: When I sneak out at night & my mommy calls me in I just hide. But when she busts out the greenies I make a very rational decision to come in for treats even though I know it means I don't get to play with my friends in the street all night carefully avoiding oncoming traffic.
customer_reviews.author: JSmith

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves them and they're pretty inexpensive. The only thing I don't like is ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves them and they're pretty inexpensive. The only thing I don't like is that you (according to the directions) have to give your cat 18 treats per day - for every 10 lbs - in order to maximize the dental benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Marie

customer_reviews.title: Got these and they all love them.
customer_reviews.text: 5 cats, 1 with "tuna breath" since she was a kitten and of course she's the one that wants to touch noses and cuddle. Got these and they all love them . . . then I looked at the label. It was tuna flavor! I just can't win . . . Seriously, hubby said the cats won't eat those, yada, yada, yada. Boy did they make a liar out of him. Have to be careful they don't OD on them.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal RNTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Great cat treats.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves them. The back of his tail puffs up when I get home and it puffs up even more when I pull out the treat bin and give him one. He is so funny. It is very good to keep your cats teeth clean however you can. They can go bad just like a humans teeth can.
customer_reviews.author: Erica O

customer_reviews.title: Great Treat
customer_reviews.text: I use this product twice per day 6 treats before each meal time. The treats have eliminated my cats extremely bad breath and also have eliminated the need to have his teeth cleaned at the vets office. As an added benefit, Tiger, now provides kisses on command by touching his nose to mine without that awful breath he had before I started using Feline Greenies!
customer_reviews.author: denis ditrichs

customer_reviews.title: The only treat my cat will eat
customer_reviews.text: My rescue kitty loves these so I'm pretty sure he thinks they taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Cinder

customer_reviews.title: I liked the idea of giving my cats a treat that ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of giving my cats a treat that was dry and therefore be better for their teeth, but the cat's do not seem to like the greenies not in either flavor i have bought. Honestly I am not so sure it's the flavor but the fact the pieces are to big and thick. Most other cat treats are a lot smaller in size.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: KitKat Loves Greenies
customer_reviews.text: Almost time to order more. One of my kitties is very finicky. Where one of my kitties (Valerie) practically eats anything, to include human treats, the other (KitKat) barely eats anything but dry cat food and a particular canned cat food only. But the Greenies--well, she absolutely loves this Treat.
customer_reviews.author: measdayme

customer_reviews.title: Good chewies!
customer_reviews.text: they love these as treat time rolls around and they sit in a row, believe it or not by elder down. Alexie, Angel, and Dickens. 13 10 6
customer_reviews.author: VINCENT

customer_reviews.title: My kitty loves these! The question is does it ...
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves these! The question is does it actuallt help her breath? To me I dont see a change. Kitty often does even chew it a lot so how chewing the treat once going to help her breath? They are so small I dont think they do much.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love them.
customer_reviews.text: Our vet wants $300 per cat to clean their teeth under anesthesia. We decided to go a different way. I won't know whether it worked until next time they have a checkup, but they seem to enjoy the treats.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: My cats love these treats
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these treats, but I've learned to buy the smaller pouches. In this container, the Greenies get dried out and apparently not so palatable as they were at first
customer_reviews.author: Ponygirl

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these and the fact that it's not ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these and the fact that it's not in a bag really helps, because he can't chew through this!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Grover

customer_reviews.title: Cat Loves These
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these treats. The big bin is cost effective and keeps them fresh.
customer_reviews.author: JimC

customer_reviews.title: My cat is in love with these treats
customer_reviews.text: My cat is in love with these treats, and, seeing as she's the only cat in the house, this box has lasted us forever. Hard to beat at that low of a price.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 2 cats agree - they're great!
customer_reviews.text: My two cats love these. They have learned to take turns to get them because they know that without cooperation no one gets treats!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cats like be them some greenies!!!
customer_reviews.text: My poor kitty was put on a diet by our vet and she said if we’re going to give him treats greenies are the only way to go. My vet explained that’s greenies are good cat my cats teeth and much healthier the other treats.
customer_reviews.author: Future RN Court

customer_reviews.title: Great product that the cat loves and is healthy for their teeth
customer_reviews.text: The kitty loves these greenies. She suffered from tartar build up and after giving her about 6 or so per day, the tartar is much less. This box is easy to use and cats can not open it.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Serene

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them and I love the jumbo size box.
customer_reviews.text: I have several cats and they all love Greenies. I love ordering this big box of Greenies - I don't have to keep going to the store for a bunch of little packages. The vet says these definitely are good for the teeth of the cats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the cats love them, but swallow them whole
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if it's helping clean their teeth, the cats love them, but swallow them whole.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: My cats love them
customer_reviews.text: I guess they taste good, as they beg for them!! lol meow, meow meow
customer_reviews.author: dls

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Snack Time!
customer_reviews.text: My two boys love these!! One of my cats has genetic gingivitis, and the vet was very pleased to see it under control with weekly teeth brushing and daily snacks! The only thing I don't like about this is the packaging. It seals well, but I can't stick my fingers in it to grab a few, I have to shake them out. Oh well, I'd rather have it cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: TanyaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: She is quite pleased with the taste
customer_reviews.text: My cat looks forward to her treats every night, and will look for them if I forget to give them to her. She is quite pleased with the taste, and I'm glad her teeth are getting cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: miriam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have to buy the bigger size, my cat goes through them too fast!
customer_reviews.author: Gwyn

customer_reviews.title: My cats LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: My cats CANNOT get enough of these - love hat they're lo-cal AND they're crispy and make a nice sound on hardwood floors... super easy to teach cats when to come by shaking the bag then tossing a few on the ground for extra sound!
customer_reviews.author: J. Salzenstein

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for the cats in your life.
customer_reviews.text: These are a HIT with the cats. Just touch the container and they'll be crawling up your legs. I actually had to hide it because they were knocking it down and chewing through the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: M. Young

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved
customer_reviews.text: Cats love these and so does my dog. The actual treat is a bit too big for kittens, i'm currently fostering one and what I do is break it half. She loves it. Container keeps them crunch with the snap on lid. Buying them online is much better deal than from petstore.
customer_reviews.author: CatLady

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: All my cats love this treat. I throw the pieces and make them chase them. It gives them good exercise and good nutrition, and it doesn't take many to leave them satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: My cats absolutely love these things
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely love these things. I don't know if it helps their dental but I can get them to do virtually anything for them. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Ray98

customer_reviews.title: Good by bags, good buy platic container!
customer_reviews.text: I love the container that keeps them fresh and I like the purchase of the larger size so I am not having to purchase them as often. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Game guroo

customer_reviews.title: Makes my cat sick
customer_reviews.text: These make my cat sick. He vomits every time he eats them. He does fine with the temptation treats. I can't recommend these for cats. The canine greenies are fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P.

customer_reviews.title: ... cat has been much livelier and his fur looks better since he started eating these and the Greenies hairball ...
customer_reviews.text: Our very old cat has been much livelier and his fur looks better since he started eating these and the Greenies hairball controls.
customer_reviews.author: Anne V WIlliams

customer_reviews.title: Kitty got in trouble because she knocked these off the ...
customer_reviews.text: Kitty got in trouble because she knocked these off the counter in order to open them. I guess she likes them!
customer_reviews.author: AReyOfSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Best treats around
customer_reviews.text: My fur babies absolutely love greenies!! I love that they clean their teeth and come in a variety of flavors and packaging options!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Mae

customer_reviews.title: Great treats
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these treats. I give them a small amount each day.
customer_reviews.author: gayle c hall

customer_reviews.title: Purrfect treats
customer_reviews.text: Our cat Puma loves these. Since brushing her teeth isn't really an option because of how much we value our own hands these do the job. Can't beat the price for the amount of treats included. We will have to remember to give her these more often since it looks like it's going to last her a whole year.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES them so much
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES these. Anytime she hears the cabinet door open where we keep them she runs over and meows until I give her a few. Sh would highly recommend these to any other felines as well!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amaca

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves them
customer_reviews.text: My cat has always loved these, and I think they are making a difference. I do give him some a few times per day (2 at a time) and also use them for training treats.
customer_reviews.author: Sam B

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves greenies
customer_reviews.text: Way more cost-conscious to buy in bulk than those small bags. Cat is addicted to these.
customer_reviews.author: Doug M

customer_reviews.title: Kitty approved
customer_reviews.text: My cat liked them, but since we have also tried Purina dentalife and she doesn't go as crazy as she does over those.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: great price I call this crack to my cats they ...
customer_reviews.text: great price I call this crack to my cats they love it~ i've bought 4 of this to get that special deal. =)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat was okay with them when I first gave ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat was okay with them when I first gave them to her, but after a few days she was begging for them.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Perkins

customer_reviews.title: The boys love them, they have turned into begging fools though
customer_reviews.text: The boys love them, they have turned into begging fools though. You think dogs that beg are annoying, try cats...they apparently have much more time on their hands to really nag you a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My little boy loves these and keeps his teeth clean (but he doesn't know it!)
customer_reviews.author: Ditto's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Cats love this treat, not sure how well it actually cleans their teeth though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep your cat healthy and happy.
customer_reviews.text: Though I rated these as "I love it," it is my cat that really loves these treats. She also benefits from the ability to clean her teeth. My veterinarian recommended these for helping keep my cats teeth clean. My cat loves them, so I am happy with them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Johann

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Love Them.
customer_reviews.text: All of our cats love them which is saying a lot because we have eight and they are all finicky to various degrees.

customer_reviews.text: My cat loves Fellne Greenies. She has them everyday to keep her teeth clean. I plan to order more.

customer_reviews.text: My cats go crazy for greenies! great to get a bit pack of them for relatively cheap

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these treats!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these (and supposedly they're good for her teeth, too!) So happy they made a jumbo format for these! I used to go through the bags so quickly!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: never seen my cats so eager to get treats before, they're always beside themselves with excitement over these

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my cats. I really like the container. It is so much better than the pouches. I like the size because I have two cats and this lasts longer than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greenies help cats take care of their teeth
customer_reviews.text: My two babies love these - all I have to do is rattle the container and they come running. Wish I had these when I first got my cats, maybe my eldest would have kept a couple of teeth she had to lose.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ponikvar

customer_reviews.title: My 2 cats love Greenies. They are a great treat when I ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 cats love Greenies. They are a great treat when I need them to do something they don't want to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She gets treats when she does good when I'm at work
customer_reviews.text: Miss Kitty LOVES theses treats and waits for me to come home so she can have some. She gets treats when she does good when I'm at work.
customer_reviews.author: Pattilyne B

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kitty
customer_reviews.text: Our incredibly finiky cat goes bats over these. Since the Tumblers treats we're discontinued, these fit the bill nicely.

customer_reviews.title: Cat doesnt like these for some reason
customer_reviews.text: Cat doesnt like these for some reason. Recieved with broken package and most spilled out so they may be too dried out for my cat

customer_reviews.title: My vet dentist told me to get these
customer_reviews.text: Well my cat loves them, and they seem to be doing OK for his teeth, considering he's on all canned diet otherwise.

customer_reviews.title: My cats love them!!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these treats and their breath seems to have improved. Good sized container at a reasonable price. I recommend them and will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa HTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My kitten is very good motivated and will do just about anything for these ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are kitty crack! My kitten is very good motivated and will do just about anything for these treats...they are a great training tool!
customer_reviews.author: Kdunk

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves them...too much!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is now extremely annoying when it comes to treats. He loves these so much, I get requests literally every hour for them. I like that they are good for his teeth but I have to avoid my cat sometimes so he will eat real food and not just snacks.

customer_reviews.title: Happy cat !!

product_meta.title: Feline Greenies Dental Treats For Cats Tempting Tuna Flavor 12 Oz. With Natural Ingredients Plus Vitamins, Minerals, And Other Nutrients (Discontinued By Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: The #1 Vet-Recommended Feline Dental Treat: Oral health issues are the most common health problems diagnosed in adult pets. FELINE GREENIES Dental Treats offer complete nutrition and help your cat maintain good dental care. They have a unique shape and crunchy texture that's proven to reduce tartar. Plus, with an irresistible taste, they are sure to stir up purrs of joy. Cat dental care has never been easier — or more delicious.
feature_bullets: Feline Greenies Dental Treats For Cats, Tempting Tuna Flavor 12 Ounce Is Bursting With Flavor And Just The Right Size To Help Prevent Tartar Buildup; Natural Ingredients Plus Vitamins, Minerals & Other Nutrients Provide Support To Dental Health

Made From Natural Ingredients Plus Vitamins, Minerals, & Other Nutrients; Give Your Feline Friend The Oral Health They Deserve With These Dental Cat Treats To Help Clean Their Teeth While Providing Complete, Balanced Nutrition With An Irresistible Taste

Complete And Balanced Nutrition: Natural Ingredients Plus Vitamins, Minerals, & Other Nutrients; Feline Greenies Dental Treats Are Formulated To Meet The Nutritional Levels Established By The Aafco Cat Food Nutrient Profiles For Adult Maintenance

Supports Oral Health: Oral Health Issues Are The Most Common Health Problems Diagnosed In Adult Pets Banfield Pet Hospital State Of Pet Health Report, 2012, And Among U.S. Veterinarians Who Recommend Dental Treats For At-Home Oral Care; Vohc Accepted
